name: VideoPad Video Editor Project File
summary: Learn about .VPJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VideoPad Video Editor projects support several input video formats. The software can also export VPJ files to CDs, DVDs, and Blu-ray discs, as well as .AVI, .WMV, .MPG, .MOV, .3GP, YouTube, and other formats.

description: Project file saved by VideoPad Video Editor, an application used for creating digital videos; stores references to video files and can include transitions, effects, and audio; used for saving the user's editing progress.
